trans-unit.source: This class provides default implementations of the functions for painting item data in a view and editing data from item models. Default implementations of the paint() and sizeHint() virtual functions, defined in QAbstractItemDelegate, are provided to ensure that the delegate implements the correct basic behavior expected by views. You can reimplement these functions in subclasses to customize the appearance of items.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供用于在视图中绘制项目数据并编辑项目模型中的数据的功能的默认实现。提供了QAbstractItemDelegate中定义的paint（）和sizeHint（）虚拟函数的默认实现，以确保委托实现视图期望的正确基本行为。您可以在子类中重新实现这些功能，以自定义项目的外观。

trans-unit.source: This class recognizes the encoding of the data by reading the encoding declaration in the XML file if it finds one, and reading the data using the corresponding encoding. If it does not find an encoding declaration, then it assumes that the data is either in UTF-8 or UTF-16, depending on whether it can find a byte-order mark.
trans-unit.target: 该类通过读取XML文件中的编码声明来识别数据的编码,如果它找到了编码声明,则使用相应的编码读取数据。如果它没有找到编码声明,那么它假设数据是UTF-8或UTF-16,这取决于它是否能找到字节顺序标记。

trans-unit.source: This clock type is based on the absolute time presented by Mach kernels, such as that found on macOS. This clock type is presented separately from MonotonicClock since macOS and iOS are also Unix systems and may support a POSIX monotonic clock with values differing from the Mach absolute time.
trans-unit.target: 此时钟类型基于Mach内核提供的绝对时间，例如在macOS上找到的绝对时间。由于macOS和iOS也是Unix系统，并且可以支持POSIX单调时钟，其值与Mach绝对时间不同，因此该时钟类型与MonotonicClock分开提供。

trans-unit.source: This clock uses the Windows functions QueryPerformanceCounter and QueryPerformanceFrequency to access the system's high-precision performance counter. Since this counter may not be available on all systems, QElapsedTimer will fall back to the TickCounter clock automatically, if this clock cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 此时钟使用Windows函数 QueryPerformanceCounter 和 QueryPerformanceFrequency 来访问系统的高精度性能计数器。由于该计数器可能并不适用于所有系统，QElapsedTimer将回落到 TickCounter 自动时钟，如果不能使用该时钟。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses QState, which inherits QAbstractState. The QState class provides a state that you can use to set properties and invoke methods on QObjects when the state is entered or exited. It also contains convenience functions for adding transitions, e.g., QSignalTransitions as in this example. See the QState class description for further details.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用QState，它继承了QAbstractState。该QState类提供了一个状态，您可以使用设置属性和调用方法上QObject的进入或退出的状态，当s。它还包含用于添加过渡的便捷功能，例如本例中的QSignalTransition。有关更多详细信息，请参见QState类描述。

trans-unit.source: This code makes "Back" a key entry in the translation files. At runtime, the translation system looks up the keyword "Back" and then gets the corresponding translation value for the current system locale. The result is returned to the text property and the user interface will show the appropriate translation of "Back" for the current locale.
trans-unit.target: 此代码使“返回”成为翻译文件中的关键条目。在运行时，翻译系统查找关键字“ Back”，然后获取当前系统区域设置的相应翻译值。结果将返回到 text 属性，并且用户界面将显示当前语言环境的“ Back”的适当翻译。

trans-unit.source: This configuration determines the type of CAN bus frames that the current device accepts. The expected value is QList<QCanBusDevice::Filter>. Passing an empty list clears all previously set filters including default filters. For more details see QCanBusDevice::Filter.

trans-unit.source: This configuration is the most flexible because no dependencies or assumptions are hardcoded about the OpenGL implementation during build time. It allows robust application deployment. When a given environment fails to provide a proper OpenGL 2.0 implementation, it will fall back automatically to ANGLE. This fallback will be completely transparent to the application, and will allow Qt Quick or other OpenGL code to function by translating to Direct3D. Such a fallback could, for example, take place on a Windows 7 PC with no additional graphics drivers installed. On other machines, where there is sufficient OpenGL support, the normal desktop OpenGL drivers will be used. Additionally, pure software-based OpenGL implementations may be available as additional fallbacks in the future, allowing running Qt Quick applications without a GPU.
trans-unit.target: 这种配置是最灵活的,因为在构建时没有对OpenGL实现的依赖性或假设进行硬编码。它允许稳健的应用部署。当给定的环境不能提供适当的OpenGL 2.0实现时,它将自动回退到ANGLE。这种回退对应用程序来说是完全透明的,并允许Qt Quick或其他OpenGL代码通过翻译成Direct3D来运行。例如,这样的回退可以发生在没有安装额外图形驱动程序的Windows 7电脑上。在其他机器上,如果有足够的OpenGL支持,将使用普通的桌面OpenGL驱动。此外,基于纯软件的OpenGL实现可能会在未来作为额外的回退,允许在没有GPU的情况下运行Qt Quick应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This configuration is the most flexible because no dependencies or assumptions are hardcoded about the OpenGL implementation during build time. It allows robust application deployment. When a given environment fails to provide a proper OpenGL 2.0 implementation, it will fall back automatically to load an alternative to opengl32.dll, the default name of which is opengl32sw.dll. The pre-built Qt packages ship a build of Mesa llvmpipe, a software rasterizer implementation of OpenGL, under that name.
trans-unit.target: 这种配置是最灵活的，因为在构建期间不会对OpenGL实现进行任何依赖或假设的硬编码。它允许强大的应用程序部署。当给定的环境无法提供正确的OpenGL 2.0实现时，它将自动回退以加载 opengl32.dll 的替代文件，该文件的默认名称为 opengl32sw.dll 。预先构建的Qt软件包以该名称提供了Mesa llvmpipe（OpenGL的软件光栅化程序实现）的构建。

trans-unit.source: This constructor inserts the item into the model of the parent that is passed to the constructor. If the model is sorted then the behavior of the insert is undetermined since the model will call the '<' operator method on the item which, at this point, is not yet constructed. To avoid the undetermined behavior, we recommend not to specify the parent and use QListWidget::insertItem() instead.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数将该项插入到传递给构造函数的父级模型中。如果对模型进行了排序，则插入物的行为不确定，因为模型将在尚未构造的项目上调用 '<' 运算符方法。为避免不确定的行为，建议不要指定父对象，而应使用QListWidget :: insertItem（）。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is convenient for short-lived painters, e.g. in a QWidget::paintEvent() and should be used only once. The constructor calls begin() for you and the QPainter destructor automatically calls end().

trans-unit.source: This constructor is required for Low Energy devices on macOS and iOS. CoreBluetooth API hides addresses and provides unique UUIDs to identify a device. This UUID is not the same thing as a service UUID and is required to work later with CoreBluetooth API and discovered devices.

trans-unit.source: This contains the available height of the collection of screens which make up the virtual desktop, in pixels, excluding window manager reserved areas such as task bars and system menus. If you want to position a Window at the bottom of the desktop, you can bind to it like this:
trans-unit.target: 这包含了组成虚拟桌面的屏幕集合的可用高度,以像素为单位,不包括任务栏和系统菜单等窗口管理器保留区域。如果你想把一个窗口定位在桌面的底部,你可以这样绑定它。

trans-unit.source: This contains the available width of the collection of screens which make up the virtual desktop, in pixels, excluding window manager reserved areas such as task bars and system menus. If you want to position a Window at the right of the desktop, you can bind to it like this:
trans-unit.target: 这包含了组成虚拟桌面的屏幕集合的可用宽度,以像素为单位,不包括任务栏和系统菜单等窗口管理器保留区域。如果你想把一个窗口定位在桌面的右边,你可以像这样绑定到它。

trans-unit.source: This contains the current orientation of the screen from the window system perspective.
trans-unit.target: 这包含了从窗口系统角度看屏幕的当前方向。

trans-unit.source: This contains the current orientation of the screen, from the accelerometer (if any). On a desktop computer, this value typically does not change.
trans-unit.target: 这包含了来自加速度计(如果有的话)的当前屏幕方向。在台式电脑上,这个值通常不会改变。

trans-unit.source: This contains the details of the triangle that was picked.
trans-unit.target: 这里面包含了所选三角形的细节。

trans-unit.source: This contains the height of the screen in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 此处包含屏幕的高度,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: This contains the primary orientation of the screen. If the screen's height is greater than its width, then the orientation is Qt.PortraitOrientation; otherwise it is Qt.LandscapeOrientation.
trans-unit.target: 这包含了屏幕的主要方向。如果屏幕的高度大于宽度,那么方向是Qt.PortraitOrientation;否则是Qt.LandscapeOrientation。

trans-unit.source: This contains the update mask for the orientation. Screen::orientation only emits changes for the screen orientations matching this mask.
trans-unit.target: 这包含方向的更新掩码。Screen :: orientation仅针对与该蒙版匹配的屏幕方向发出更改。

trans-unit.source: This contains the width of the screen in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 这包含了屏幕的宽度,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: This data can be extracted through a variety of methods. One of the most well known methods of positioning is GPS (Global Positioning System), a publicly available system that uses radiowave signals received from Earth-orbiting satellites to calculate the precise position and time of the receiver. Another popular method is 'Cell Identifier Positioning', which uses the cell identifier of the cell site that is currently serving the receiving device to calculate its approximate location. These and other positioning methods can all be used with the Location API; the only requirement for a location data source within the API is that it provides a latitude-longitude coordinate with a date/time value, with the option of providing the other attributes listed above.
trans-unit.target: 这种数据可以通过各种方法提取。最著名的定位方法之一是GPS(全球定位系统),这是一个公开的系统,使用从地球轨道卫星接收的无线电波信号来计算接收器的精确位置和时间。另一种流行的方法是 "小区标识符定位",它使用当前为接收设备提供服务的小区站点的小区标识符来计算其大致位置。这些方法和其他定位方法都可以与Location API一起使用;API中对位置数据源的唯一要求是,它必须提供一个带有日期/时间值的经纬度坐标,并可以选择提供上述其他属性。

Objects of this class can represent an Advertising Data packet or a Scan Response packet.
trans-unit.target: 此数据可以包括设备名称，设备提供的GATT服务等。通过调用QLowEnergyController :: startAdvertising（）启动广告时，将使用通过此类设置的数据。此类的对象可以表示广告数据包或扫描响应包。

trans-unit.source: This datagram's destination address is not copied if it is an IPv4 address because it is not possible to tell an IPv4 broadcast address apart from a regular IPv4 address without an exhaustive search of all addresses assigned to this machine. Attempting to send a datagram with the sender address equal to the broadcast address is likely to fail. However, this should not affect the communication as network interfaces with multiple IPv4 addresses are uncommon, so the address the operating system will select will likely be one the peer will understand.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个数据报的目的地址是IPv4地址,则不会被复制,因为如果不对分配给这台机器的所有地址进行详尽的搜索,就无法区分IPv4广播地址和普通IPv4地址。试图发送发送者地址等于广播地址的数据报,很可能会失败。不过,这应该不会影响通信,因为具有多个IPv4地址的网络接口并不常见,所以操作系统选择的地址很可能是对等机能够理解的地址。

trans-unit.source: This differs from providing qt_SubRect_<name> uniforms in that the latter allows drawing one or more textures from the atlas in a single ShaderEffect item, while supportsAtlasTextures allows multiple instances of a ShaderEffect component using a different source image from the atlas to be batched in a single draw. Both prevent a texture from being copied out of the atlas when referenced by a ShaderEffect.
trans-unit.target: 这与提供qt_SubRect_ <name>制服不同，后者可以在单个ShaderEffect项中从图集绘制一个或多个纹理，而supportsAtlasTextures允许使用与图集不同的源图像将ShaderEffect组件的多个实例批处理到一个单次抽奖。当被ShaderEffect引用时，这两者都可以防止纹理从图集中复制出来。

trans-unit.source: This document demonstrates two different ways of integrating normal C++ code (that uses Qt) with managed .NET code. First, the manual way is presented, which includes using a thin MC++ wrapper class around the normal Qt/C++ class. Then, the automated way is presented, which utilizes the ActiveQt framework as a generic bridge. The advantage of the first method is that it gives the application developer full control, while the second method requires less coding and relieves the developer of dealing with the conversion between managed and normal data objects.
trans-unit.target: 本文档演示了将普通C ++代码（使用Qt）与托管.NET代码集成的两种不同方式。首先，介绍了手动方式，其中包括在常规Qt / C ++类周围使用瘦MC ++包装器类。然后，提出了一种自动化方法，该方法利用ActiveQt框架作为通用桥梁。第一种方法的优点是它使应用程序开发人员具有完全控制权，而第二种方法需要较少的编码，并减轻了开发人员处理托管数据对象和普通数据对象之间的转换的负担。

trans-unit.source: This document demonstrates two different ways of integrating normal C++ code (that uses Qt) with managed .NET code. First, the manual way is presented, which includes using a thin MC++ wrapper class around the normal Qt/C++ class. Then, the automated way is presented, which utilizes the ActiveQt framework as a generic bridge. The advantage of the first method is that it gives the application developer full control, while the second method requires less coding and relieves the developer of dealing with the conversion between managed and normal data objects.
trans-unit.target: 本文档演示了将普通C ++代码（使用Qt）与托管.NET代码集成的两种不同方式。首先，介绍了手动方式，其中包括在常规Qt / C ++类周围使用瘦MC ++包装器类。然后，提出了一种自动化方法，该方法利用ActiveQt框架作为通用桥梁。第一种方法的优点是它使应用程序开发人员具有完全控制权，而第二种方法需要较少的编码，并减轻了开发人员处理托管数据对象与普通数据对象之间的转换的负担。

trans-unit.source: This document describes the basic drag and drop mechanism and outlines the approach used to enable it in custom controls. Drag and drop operations are also supported by many of Qt's controls, such as the item views and graphics view framework, as well as editing controls for Qt Widgets and Qt Quick. More information about item views and graphics view is available in Using drag and drop with item views and Graphics View Framework.
trans-unit.target: 本文档介绍了基本的拖放机制，并概述了在自定义控件中启用它的方法。 Qt的许多控件（例如项目视图和图形视图框架）以及Qt Widgets和Qt Quick的编辑控件也支持拖放操作。有关在项目视图和图形视图框架中使用拖放的信息，请参见有关项目视图和图形视图的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This document explains how the default scene graph renderer works internally, so that one can write code that uses it in an optimal fashion, both performance and feature-wise.
trans-unit.target: 本文档解释了默认场景图渲染器的内部工作原理,以便人们可以编写以最佳方式使用它的代码,包括性能和功能方面。

trans-unit.source: This document explains how the scene graph renderer for OpenGL works internally so that one can write code that uses it in an optimal fashion, both performance-wise and feature-wise.
trans-unit.target: 本文档解释了OpenGL的场景图渲染器的内部工作原理,以便人们可以编写以最佳方式使用它的代码,无论是从性能上还是从功能上。

trans-unit.source: This effect adds a vertical gradient to the whole scene, then additively blends it with all other elements on the layer. Additive blending adds the pixel values of the gradient and the layer, making the result lighter. White areas do not change, and black areas are the same color as the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 这个效果是在整个场景中添加一个垂直渐变,然后与图层上的所有其他元素进行加法混合。加法混合会增加渐变和图层的像素值,使结果更轻。白色区域不改变,黑色区域与渐变的颜色相同。

trans-unit.source: This effect adjusts the source item colors separately for each color channel. Source item contrast can be adjusted and color balance altered.
trans-unit.target: 该效果可分别调整源项目的每个颜色通道的颜色。可以调整源项目的对比度并改变色彩平衡。

trans-unit.source: This effect adjusts the source item colors. Brightness adjustment changes the perceived luminance of the source item. Contrast adjustment increases or decreases the color and brightness variations.
trans-unit.target: 该效果可调整源项目的颜色。亮度调整会改变源项目的感知亮度。对比度调整增加或减少颜色和亮度的变化。

trans-unit.source: This effect is intended to have good performance. The shape of the glow is limited to a rectangle with a custom corner radius. For situations where custom shapes are required, consider Glow effect.
trans-unit.target: 该效果旨在具有良好的性能。发光的形状仅限于具有自定义拐角半径的矩形。对于需要自定义形状的情况，请考虑发光效果。

trans-unit.source: This effect provides a simple one-pass blur. It is less expensive than GaussianBlur, but does not give the same quality result.
trans-unit.target: 此效果提供了简单的单次通过模糊。它比GaussianBlur便宜，但没有给出相同的质量结果。

trans-unit.source: This effectively means that the control types (like Button) from the last imported style will be used. We refer to this as compile time style selection.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上意味着将使用上次导入的样式中的控件类型(如Button)。我们把这称为编译时的样式选择。

trans-unit.source: This effectively means the model has no elements or attributes of type IDREF.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上意味着该模型没有 IDREF 类型的元素或属性。

trans-unit.source: This effectively means the model has no elements that have an id.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上意味着该模型没有具有id的元素。

trans-unit.source: This element allows to define a list of polylines at once. Each polyline in the list will be preceded by a moveTo command, effectively making each polyline a separate one. The polylines in this list are supposed to be non-intersecting with each other. In any case, when used in conjunction with a ShapePath, the containing ShapePath's ShapePath::fillRule applies. That is, with the default OddEvenFill and non intersecting shapes, the largest shape in the list defines an area to be filled; areas where two shapes overlap are holes; areas where three shapes overlap are filled areas inside holes, etc.
trans-unit.target: 该元素允许一次定义多段线列表。列表中的每条多段线之前都会带有moveTo命令，从而有效地使每条多段线成为单独的一条。该列表中的折线应该彼此不相交。无论如何，当与ShapePath结合使用时，将应用包含ShapePath的ShapePath :: fillRule。也就是说，使用默认的 OddEvenFill 和不相交的形状，列表中最大的形状定义了要填充的区域。两种形状重叠的区域是孔；三种形状重叠的区域是孔等内部的填充区域。

trans-unit.source: This element allows you to set timed transitions on particle groups.

trans-unit.source: This element defines the shape of a specified string in a specified font. The text's baseline will be translated to the x and y coordinates, and the outlines from the font will be added to the path accordingly.

trans-unit.source: This element emits logical particles into the ParticleSystem, with the starting positions based on those of other logical particles.

trans-unit.source: This element models the gravity of a massive object whose center of gravity is far away (and thus the gravitational pull is effectively constant across the scene). To model the gravity of an object near or inside the scene, use PointAttractor.
trans-unit.target: 这个元素可以模拟一个巨大物体的重力,这个物体的重心在很远的地方(因此整个场景的引力实际上是恒定的)。要模拟场景附近或场景内部物体的重力,请使用PointAttractor。

trans-unit.source: This element will accelerate all affected particles to a vector of the specified magnitude in the specified angle. If the angle and acceleration do not vary, it is more efficient to set the specified acceleration on the Emitter.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the resources are linked into the final application binary in the case of static linking. You should put the initialization code close to where the resources are used in your library, so that clients of your library will only link in the resources if they use the feature of the library that depends on them.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes QGraphicsItem's cache modes. Caching is used to speed up rendering by allocating and rendering to an off-screen pixel buffer, which can be reused when the item requires redrawing. For some paint devices, the cache is stored directly in graphics memory, which makes rendering very quick.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了QGraphicsItem的缓存模式。缓存用于通过分配和渲染到屏幕外像素缓冲区来加快渲染速度，当需要重新绘制项目时可以重复使用。对于某些绘画设备，缓存直接存储在图形内存中，这使得渲染非常快。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes QQuickPaintedItem's render targets. The render target is the surface QPainter paints onto before the item is rendered on screen.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了QQuickPaintedItem的呈现目标。渲染目标是在屏幕上渲染项目之前QPainter绘制到的表面。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes all possible error conditions during the service's existence. The error() function returns the last occurred error.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes all supported register types.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes all the possible error conditions as defined by Modbus Exception Codes. They are set by the server after checking the appropriate error conditions in the reply to a request and must be decoded by the client to operate on the exception code.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了Modbus异常代码所定义的所有可能的错误条件。它们是由服务器在检查请求回复中的相应错误条件后设置的,客户端必须对异常代码进行解码操作。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes all the possible error conditions.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了所有可能的错误条件。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes flags that are used when drawing primitive elements.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes flags that you can combine to configure the behavior of QDirIterator.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes flags that you can enable to improve rendering performance in QGraphicsView. By default, none of these flags are set. Note that setting a flag usually imposes a side effect, and this effect can vary between paint devices and platforms.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了可以启用以改善QGraphicsView中的呈现性能的标志。默认情况下，这些标志均未设置。请注意，设置标志通常会产生副作用，并且此效果可能在绘画设备和平台之间有所不同。

trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了可以启用以提高QQuickPaintedItem中的呈现性能的标志。默认情况下，这些标志均未设置。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes general and TLS-specific errors that can be encountered by objects of the classes QDtlsClientVerifier and QDtls.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了QDtlsClientVerifier和QDtls类的对象可能遇到的常规错误和TLS特定错误。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes how QColormap maps device independent RGB values to device dependent pixel values.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了QColormap如何将与设备无关的RGB值映射到与设备相关的像素值。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes how QGraphicsPixmapItem calculates its shape and opaque area.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了QGraphicsPixmapItem如何计算其形状和不透明区域。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes how QGraphicsView updates its viewport when the scene contents change or are exposed.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了当场景内容更改或公开时QGraphicsView如何更新其视口。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes how a frame is located relative to the surrounding text.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了一个框架相对于周围文本的位置。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes how accepting a gesture can cancel other gestures automatically.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了接受一个手势如何自动取消其他手势。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes how an action should be moved into the application menu on macOS.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了如何将动作移至macOS的应用程序菜单中。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes how an action should be moved into the application menu on macOS.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了在macOS上如何将一个操作移动到应用程序菜单中。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes how each pixel is interpreted. If a pixel is read as a full 32 bit unsigned integer and then each channel is masked out, or if each byte is read as unsigned char values. Typically QImage formats interpret one pixel as an unsigned integer and then the color channels are masked out. OpenGL on the other hand typically interpreted pixels "one byte after the other", Ie. unsigned byte.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了每个像素的解释方式。如果将像素读取为完整的32位无符号整数，然后将每个通道屏蔽掉，或者如果将每个字节读取为无符号char值。通常，QImage格式将一个像素解释为无符号整数，然后将颜色通道屏蔽掉。另一方面，OpenGL通常将像素解释为“一个字节接一个字节”，即。无符号字节。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes how navigation requests to URLs with unknown schemes are handled.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes if the alpha channel is used or not. Sometimes the pixelformat will have a size for the alpha channel, but the pixel format does actually not use the alpha channel. For example RGB32 is such a format. The RGB channels are 8 bits each, and there is no alpha channel. But the complete size for each pixel is 32. Therefore the alpha channel size is 8, but the alpha channel is ignored. Its important to note that in such situations the position of the alpha channel is significant.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述的是alpha通道是否被使用。有时像素格式会有一个alpha通道的大小,但实际上像素格式并没有使用alpha通道。例如RGB32就是这样一种格式。RGB通道每个8位,没有alpha通道。但是每个像素的完整尺寸是32。因此alpha通道的大小是8,但是alpha通道被忽略了。需要注意的是,在这种情况下,alpha通道的位置很重要。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the minor device classes for peripheral devices.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了外围设备的次要设备类别。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the minor device classes for phone devices.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了手机设备的次要设备类。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the mode the printer should work in. It basically presets a certain resolution and working mode.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了打印机的工作模式。它基本上预设了一定的分辨率和工作模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the pairing state between the two Bluetooth devices.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了两个蓝牙设备之间的配对状态。

trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了用户可以为数据或设备访问设置的权限策略。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the phase of scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了滚动的阶段。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the platform feature access categories that the user may be asked to grant or deny access to:

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the position of the category labels.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the position of the selected tab. Some styles need to draw a tab differently depending on whether or not it is adjacent to the selected tab.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible High-DPI scale factor rounding policies, which decide how non-integer scale factors (such as Windows 150%) are handled.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了可能的High-DPI缩放因子四舍五入策略,它决定了如何处理非整数缩放因子(如Windows 150%)。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible RS-232 pinout signals.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了可能的RS-232引出信号。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible configuration options for the CAN bus connection.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了CAN总线连接的可能配置选项。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible directions for the gesture's motion along the horizontal and vertical axes.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了手势沿水平轴和垂直轴运动的可能方向。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible directions of the data transmission.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了数据传输的可能方向。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible error types.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了可能的错误类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible hints that can be used to change the way libraries are handled when they are loaded. These values indicate how symbols are resolved when libraries are loaded, and are specified using the setLoadHints() function.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了可能的提示，这些提示可用于更改加载库时的处理方式。这些值指示在加载库时如何解析符号，并使用setLoadHints（）函数指定这些值。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible hints that can be used to control how blur effects are applied. The hints might not have an effect in all the paint engines.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举描述了可用于控制如何应用模糊效果的可能提示。这些提示可能不会在所有的涂料引擎中都有效果。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible options that can be used to create the socket. This changes the access permissions on platforms (Linux, Windows) that support access permissions on the socket. Both GroupAccess and OtherAccess may vary slightly in meanings depending on the platform.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了可以用来创建套接字的可能选项。这改变了支持套接字访问权限的平台(Linux,Windows)上的访问权限。GroupAccess和OtherAccess的含义可能因平台不同而略有不同。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible reply type.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了可能的回复类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible requirements for reading or writing an ATT attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了读写ATT属性的可能要求。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible server objects. The interface consists of three categories of objects:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了可能的服务器对象。该接口由三类对象组成。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible standards used by qChecksum().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了qChecksum（）使用的可能标准。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible submit policies a QDataWidgetMapper supports.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了QDataWidgetMapper支持的可能的提交策略。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the possible values that can be set for a Modbus device connection.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了可以为Modbus设备连接设置的可能值。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the process channels used by the running process. Pass one of these values to setReadChannel() to set the current read channel of QProcess.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了正在运行的进程使用的进程通道。将这些值之一传递给setReadChannel（）以设置QProcess的当前读取通道。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the process channels used by the running process. Pass one of these values to setReadChannel() to set the current read channel of QProcess.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了正在运行的进程使用的进程通道。将这些值之一传递给setReadChannel（）以设置QProcess的当前读取通道。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the process input channel modes of QProcess. Pass one of these values to setInputChannelMode() to set the current write channel mode.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了QProcess的进程输入通道模式。将这些值之一传递给setInputChannelMode（）以设置当前的写入通道模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the process input channel modes of QProcess. Pass one of these values to setInputChannelMode() to set the current write channel mode.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了QProcess的进程输入通道模式。将这些值之一传递给setInputChannelMode（）以设置当前的写入通道模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the process output channel modes of QProcess. Pass one of these values to setProcessChannelMode() to set the current read channel mode.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了QProcess的进程输出通道模式。将这些值之一传递给setProcessChannelMode（）以设置当前的读取通道模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the process output channel modes of QProcess. Pass one of these values to setProcessChannelMode() to set the current read channel mode.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了QProcess的进程输出通道模式。将这些值之一传递给setProcessChannelMode（）以设置当前的读取通道模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the roles that can be used to describe buttons in the button box. Combinations of these roles are as flags used to describe different aspects of their behavior.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the service class of the Bluetooth device. The service class is used as a rudimentary form of service discovery. It is meant to provide a list of the types of services that the device might provide.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the types of connection that can be used between signals and slots. In particular, it determines whether a particular signal is delivered to a slot immediately or queued for delivery at a later time.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the types of elements used to connect vertices in subpaths.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the types of format that can be used when converting QDate and QTime objects to strings.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了将QDate和QTime对象转换为字符串时可以使用的格式类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the types of markers a list item can have. If a list item (a paragraph for which QTextBlock::textList() returns the list) has a marker, it is rendered instead of the normal bullet. In this way, checkable list items can be mixed with plain list items in the same list, overriding the type of bullet specified by the QTextListFormat::style() for the entire list.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了列表项可以具有的标记的类型。如果列表项（QTextBlock :: textList（）返回列表的段落）具有标记，则将其呈现，而不是普通的项目符号。这样，可检查列表项可以与同一列表中的普通列表项混合，从而覆盖整个列表的QTextListFormat :: style（）指定的项目符号类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the types of network proxying provided in Qt.

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the types of resources that can be loaded by QTextDocument's loadResource() function or by QTextBrowser::setSource().

trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了各种可用的像素度量。一个像素度量是由一个像素值来表示的与风格相关的大小。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the various errors that can occur when trying to resolve a host name.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了在尝试解析主机名时可能发生的各种错误。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the various modes of overshooting.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了各种超调模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the various normalized forms of Unicode text.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了Unicode文本的各种标准化形式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the various per-dimension sizing types used when constructing a QSizePolicy.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了构造QSizePolicy时使用的各种尺寸调整类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the various primitive elements. A primitive element is a common GUI element, such as a checkbox indicator or button bevel.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了各种基元。基元是一种常见的GUI元素,如复选框指示器或按钮斜面。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the various types of events that a socket notifier can recognize. The type must be specified when constructing the socket notifier.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了套接字通知器可以识别的各种事件类型。在构造套接字通知器时必须指定类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the various types of line spacing support paragraphs can have.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了各种类型的行距支持段落可以有。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the various ways of placing a function call. The valid modes are:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了放置函数调用的各种方式。有效的方式有:

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the view mode of the area; i.e. how sub-windows will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了该区域的视图模式,即子窗口的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the view mode of the file dialog; i.e. what information about each file will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了文件对话框的视图模式,即每个文件的信息将被显示。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the way the model changes layout.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了模型改变布局的方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the way the parser interprets command-line options that use a single dash followed by multiple letters, as as -abc.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了解析器解释命令行选项的方式，该选项使用单个破折号和多个字母（如 -abc )。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the way the parser interprets options that occur after positional arguments.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了解析器解释位置参数后出现的选项的方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the way the selection model will be updated.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了选择模型的更新方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes the ways that adjacent characters can be vertically aligned.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了相邻字符垂直对齐的方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes under what circumstances a software input panel will be requested by input capable widgets.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举描述了在什么情况下,软件输入面板会被具有输入功能的小组件请求。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes what has changed in QGraphicsEffectSource.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了QGraphicsEffectSource中发生的变化。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes what kind of QTextObject this format is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了该格式与哪种QTextObject相关联。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes what part of the screen the window occupies or should occupy.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述了窗口占据或应该占据屏幕的哪个部分。

trans-unit.source: This enum has been deprecated. Use ApplicationStateChange instead.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举已被废弃。使用ApplicationStateChange代替。

trans-unit.source: This enum has the following values:
trans-unit.target: 该枚举有以下值:

trans-unit.source: This enum holds the camera lock type.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于保存摄像机锁定类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum holds the capture mode of the camera.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举保存了相机的捕获模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum holds the current state of the camera.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举保存摄像机的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum holds the current status of the camera.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举保存摄像机的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum holds the different types of tabulator
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举包含了不同类型的制表机。

trans-unit.source: This enum holds the last error code.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举保存最后的错误代码。

trans-unit.source: This enum holds the overall status for all the requested camera locks.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举保存所有请求的摄像机锁的总体状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum holds the reason why the camera lock status changed.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举保存摄像机锁定状态改变的原因。

trans-unit.source: This enum identifies several attribute types.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举标识了几种属性类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum identifies the faces of a cube map texture
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举标识了一个立方体地图纹理的面。

trans-unit.source: This enum identifies the format of the shader code used.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举标识了使用的shader代码的格式。

trans-unit.source: This enum identifies the state of loading
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举标识了加载的状态

trans-unit.source: This enum identifies the status of animation clip.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举标识动画片段的状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum identifies the status of shader used.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举标识了使用的shader的状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum identifies the status of skeleton.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举标识了骨架的状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum identifies the type of profile required.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举确定了所需的配置文件的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum identifies the type of shader used.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举标识了使用的shader类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum indicates how the view responds to user selections:
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示视图如何响应用户的选择。

trans-unit.source: This enum indicates the position of the drop indicator in relation to the index at the current mouse position:
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示在当前鼠标位置上,下降指示器相对于索引的位置。

trans-unit.source: This enum indicates the type of menu item that the structure describes.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示该结构描述的菜单项的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum indicates whether a given host address is eligible to be published in the Domain Name System (DNS) or other similar name resolution mechanisms. In general, an address is suitable for publication if it is an address this machine will be reached at for an indeterminate amount of time, though it need not be permanent. For example, addresses obtained via DHCP are often eligible, but cryptographically-generated temporary IPv6 addresses are not.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举表示一个给定的主机地址是否有资格在域名系统(DNS)或其他类似的名称解析机制中公布。一般来说,如果一个地址是这个机器在不确定的时间内可以到达的地址,那么这个地址就适合发布,尽管它不需要是永久性的。例如,通过DHCP获得的地址通常符合条件,但通过密码生成的临时IPv6地址则不符合条件。

trans-unit.source: This enum indicates whether the implementation of the chooseFiles() function should return only one file or may return multiple files:
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表明selectFiles（）函数的实现是应仅返回一个文件还是可以返回多个文件：

trans-unit.source: This enum is a bit mask identifying several states.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举是一个位掩码,识别几种状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum is a convienience type for Bluetooth low energy service characteristics class UUIDs. Values of this type will be implicitly converted into a QBluetoothUuid when necessary. The detailed type descriptions can be found on bluetooth.org.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举是蓝牙低功耗服务特征类UUID的便捷类型。必要时，此类型的值将隐式转换为QBluetoothUuid。可以在bluetooth.org上找到详细的类型描述。

trans-unit.source: This enum is a convienience type for Bluetooth protocol UUIDs. Values of this type will be implicitly converted into a QBluetoothUuid when necessary.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举是Bluetooth协议UUID的便捷类型。必要时，此类型的值将隐式转换为QBluetoothUuid。

trans-unit.source: This enum is a convienience type for Bluetooth service class and profile UUIDs. Values of this type will be implicitly converted into a QBluetoothUuid when necessary. Some UUIDs refer to service class ids, others to profile ids and some can be used as both. In general, profile UUIDs shall only be used in a QBluetoothServiceInfo::BluetoothProfileDescriptorList attribute and service class UUIDs shall only be used in a QBluetoothServiceInfo::ServiceClassIds attribute. If the UUID is marked as profile and service class UUID it can be used as a value for either of the above service attributes. Such a dual use has historical reasons but is no longer permissible for newer UUIDs.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举是Bluetooth服务类和配置文件UUID的便捷类型。必要时，此类型的值将隐式转换为QBluetoothUuid。一些UUID引用服务类ID，另一些UUID引用配置文件ID，另一些可以同时使用。通常，配置文件UUID仅应在QBluetoothServiceInfo :: BluetoothProfileDescriptorList属性中使用，服务类UUID应仅在QBluetoothServiceInfo :: ServiceClassIds属性中使用。如果将UUID标记为配置文件和服务类UUID，则可以将其用作上述服务属性之一的值。这种双重用途具有历史原因，但对于新的UUID不再允许。

trans-unit.source: This enum is a convienience type for descriptor class UUIDs. Values of this type will be implicitly converted into a QBluetoothUuid when necessary. The detailed type specifications can be found on bluetooth.org.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举是描述符类UUID的便捷类型。必要时，此类型的值将隐式转换为QBluetoothUuid。可以在bluetooth.org上找到详细的类型规范。

trans-unit.source: This enum is returned by readString() and readByteArray() and is used to indicate what the status of the parsing is.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举由readString（）和readByteArray（）返回，并用于指示解析的状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used by QGraphicsLayoutItem::sizeHint()
trans-unit.target: 该枚举由QGraphicsLayoutItem :: sizeHint（）使用

trans-unit.source: This enum is used by QPainter::drawRoundedRect() and QPainterPath::addRoundedRect() functions to specify the radii of rectangle corners with respect to the dimensions of the bounding rectangles specified.
trans-unit.target: QPainter :: drawRoundedRect（）和QPainterPath :: addRoundedRect（）函数使用该枚举来指定矩形角的半径，该半径相对于指定的边界矩形的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used by compressionAlgorithm() to indicate which algorithm the RCC tool used to compress the payload.
trans-unit.target: compressionAlgorithm（）使用此枚举来指示RCC工具用于压缩有效负载的算法。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used by QSurfaceFormat to specify the swap behaviour of a surface. The swap behaviour is mostly transparent to the application, but it affects factors such as rendering latency and throughput.
trans-unit.target: QSurfaceFormat使用此枚举指定表面的交换行为。交换行为对应用程序基本上是透明的，但它会影响渲染延迟和吞吐量等因素。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used by toString(StringFormat) to control the formatting of the string representation. The possible values are:
trans-unit.target: toString（StringFormat）使用此枚举来控制字符串表示形式的格式。可能的值为：

trans-unit.source: This enum is used by the fileTime() and setFileTime() functions.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举由fileTime（）和setFileTime（）函数使用。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used by the constructor and setKey(). Its purpose is to enable handling the problem in Unix implementations of semaphores that survive a crash. In Unix, when a semaphore survives a crash, we need a way to force it to reset its resource count, when the system reuses the semaphore. In Windows, where semaphores can't survive a crash, this enum has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数和setKey（）使用此枚举。其目的是使在崩溃中幸存的信号量的Unix实现中能够解决该问题。在Unix中，当信号在崩溃中幸存下来时，我们需要一种方法来在系统重用信号时强制其重置其资源计数。在Windows中，信号量无法在崩溃中幸免，该枚举无效。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used by the permission() function to report the permissions and ownership of a file. The values may be OR-ed together to test multiple permissions and ownership values.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举被 permission()函数用来报告文件的权限和所有权。这些值可以一起被OR-ed来测试多个权限和所有权值。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in QGraphicsItem, QGraphicsScene and QGraphicsView to specify how items are selected, or how to determine if shapes and items collide.
trans-unit.target: 在QGraphicsItem，QGraphicsScene和QGraphicsView中使用此枚举来指定如何选择项目，或如何确定形状和项目是否碰撞。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in QGraphicsScene to specify what to do with currently selected items when setting a selection area.
trans-unit.target: 在QGraphicsScene中使用此枚举指定在设置选择区域时如何处理当前选择的项目。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in conjuntion with the QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::deviceUpdated() signal and indicates the field that changed.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent :: deviceUpdated（）信号结合使用，并指示已更改的字段。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in the option argument to toDiagnosticNotation(), to modify the output format.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于toDiagnosticNotation（）的option参数中，以修改输出格式。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in the options argument to toCbor(), modifying the behavior of the encoder.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于toCbor（）的options参数中，以修改编码器的行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in widgets that can display both plain text and rich text, for example QLabel. It is used for deciding whether a text string should be interpreted as one or the other. This is normally done by passing one of the enum values to a QTextEdit::setTextFormat() function.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于可同时显示纯文本和富文本的小部件，例如QLabel。它用于确定是否应将一个文本字符串解释为一个字符串。通常通过将枚举值之一传递给QTextEdit :: setTextFormat（）函数来完成。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used internally by QStyleOption, its subclasses, and qstyleoption_cast() to determine the type of style option. In general you do not need to worry about this unless you want to create your own QStyleOption subclass and your own styles.
trans-unit.target: QStyleOption，其子类和qstyleoption_cast（）在内部使用此枚举来确定样式选项的类型。通常，除非您要创建自己的QStyleOption子类和自己的样式，否则无需担心。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to communicate properties between the print engine and QPrinter. A property may or may not be supported by a given print engine.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于在打印引擎和QPrinter之间传递属性。给定的打印引擎可能支持或可能不支持属性。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to control whether or not transient parents should be considered ancestors.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来控制是否应该将瞬移的父母视为祖先。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe how a page should be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来描述一个页面应该如何渲染。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe parts of a window frame. It is returned by QGraphicsWidget::windowFrameSectionAt() to describe what section of the window frame is under the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于描述窗口框架的各个部分。它由QGraphicsWidget :: windowFrameSectionAt（）返回，以描述窗口框的哪个部分位于鼠标下方。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe the features or capabilities that the paint engine has. If a feature is not supported by the engine, QPainter will do a best effort to emulate that feature through other means and pass on an alpha blended QImage to the engine with the emulated results. Some features cannot be emulated: AlphaBlend and PorterDuff.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于描述绘画引擎具有的功能。如果引擎不支持某个功能，则QPainter将尽最大努力通过其他方式来仿真该功能，并将具有alpha混合效果的QImage传递给引擎并提供仿真结果。某些功能无法仿真：AlphaBlend和PorterDuff。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe the permission status.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来描述权限状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe the position of a toolbar line, as well as the toolbar's position within the line.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来描述工具栏线的位置,以及工具栏在该线中的位置。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe the view mode of the preview widget.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于描述预览小组件的视图模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe whether a toolbar is movable or not.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来描述一个工具栏是否可以移动。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe zoom mode of the preview widget.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于描述预览小组件的缩放模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to hold information about the type of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleHintReturn subclass.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于保存有关样式选项类型的信息，并为每个QStyleHintReturn子类定义。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to hold information about the type of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于保存有关样式选项类型的信息，并为每个QStyleOption子类定义。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to hold information about the version of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleHintReturn subclass.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于保存有关样式选项版本的信息，并为每个QStyleHintReturn子类定义。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to hold information about the version of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于保存有关样式选项版本的信息，并为每个QStyleOption子类定义。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to indicate what the user may select in the file dialog; i.e. what the dialog will return if the user clicks OK.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用于指示用户在文件对话框中可以选择的内容;即如果用户点击确定,对话框将返回什么。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to indicate whether or not a check mark should be drawn for the item, or even if it should be drawn at all.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于指示是否应该为该项目画上复选标记,甚至是否应该画上复选标记。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to indicate whether printing will occur on one or both sides of each sheet of paper (simplex or duplex printing).
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于指示在每张纸的一面或两面进行打印(单面或双面打印)。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to represent the placement of the item on a row. This can be used to draw items differently depending on their placement, for example by putting rounded edges at the beginning and end, and straight edges in between.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来表示项目在行上的位置。这可以用来根据项目的位置来绘制不同的项目,例如,在开始和结束处放置圆角边,而在中间放置直角边。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify a single-valued type.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来指定一个单值类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify extensions to be installed via installExtensions().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于指定要通过installExtensions（）安装的扩展。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify the OpenGL context profile, in conjunction with QSurfaceFormat::setMajorVersion() and QSurfaceFormat::setMinorVersion().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于与QSurfaceFormat :: setMajorVersion（）和QSurfaceFormat :: setMinorVersion（）一起指定OpenGL上下文配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify the OpenGL context profile, in conjunction with QSurfaceFormat::setMajorVersion() and QSurfaceFormat::setMinorVersion().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于与QSurfaceFormat :: setMajorVersion（）和QSurfaceFormat :: setMinorVersion（）一起指定OpenGL上下文配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify the preferred color space, controlling if the window's associated default framebuffer is able to do updates and blending in a given encoding instead of the standard linear operations.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来指定首选的颜色空间,控制窗口相关的默认帧缓冲区是否能够在给定的编码中进行更新和混合,而不是标准的线性操作。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify the type of a bind parameter.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来指定绑定参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify whether a Node will accept a url with an unrecognized schema for the hostUrl. By default only urls with known schemas are accepted, but using AllowExternalRegistration will enable the Registry to pass your external (to QtRO) url to client Nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于指定Node是否接受hostUrl具有无法识别的架构的url。默认情况下，仅接受具有已知架构的URL，但是使用 AllowExternalRegistration 将使注册表能够将您的外部（传递给QtRO）URL传递给客户端节点。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used when opening a file to specify additional options which only apply to files and not to a generic QIODevice.
trans-unit.target: 打开文件时使用此枚举来指定仅适用于文件而不适用于常规QIODevice的其他选项。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used with QAndroidBinder::transact() to describe the mode in which the IPC call is performed.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与QAndroidBinder :: transact（）一起使用，以描述执行IPC调用的模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used with open() to describe the mode in which a device is opened. It is also returned by openMode().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与open（）一起使用，以描述打开设备的模式。它也由openMode（）返回。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used with QtAndroid::bindService to describe the mode in which the binding is performed.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与QtAndroid :: bindService一起使用，以描述执行绑定的模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used with QTouchDevice::capabilities() to indicate what kind of information the touch device or its driver can provide.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与QTouchDevice :: capabilities（）一起使用，以指示触摸设备或其驱动程序可以提供什么样的信息。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used with the toRawForm() function to declare which form of a cookie shall be returned.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与toRawForm（）函数一起使用，以声明应返回哪种形式的cookie。

trans-unit.source: This enum lets you know where the section's position is in relation to the other sections.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举可以让你知道该部分的位置与其他部分的关系。

trans-unit.source: This enum lets you know where the section's position is in relation to the selected section.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举可以让你知道节的位置与所选节的关系。

trans-unit.source: This enum lists all the things that can be benchmarked.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举列出了所有可以被基准化的东西。

trans-unit.source: This enum lists the possible network request priorities.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举列出了可能的网络请求优先级。

trans-unit.source: This enum maps the Unicode character categories.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举映射了Unicode字符类别。

trans-unit.source: This enum numbers the different tests.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举对不同的测试进行编号。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides additional information concerning a QMouseEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举提供了有关QMouseEvent的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides platform-specific information about the sizes of data structures used by the underlying architecture.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举提供了有关底层架构使用的数据结构大小的平台特定信息。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides pre-defined world IDs for isolating user scripts into different worlds:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举提供了预先定义的世界ID,用于将用户脚本隔离到不同的世界中。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides shorter names for the keyboard modifier keys supported by Qt.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举为Qt支持的键盘修饰键提供了较短的名称。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides symbolic names for the various operating system families supported by QOperatingSystemVersion.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举为QOperatingSystemVersion支持的各种操作系统家族提供符号名称。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides symbolic synonyms for the data serialization format version numbers.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举提供了数据序列化格式版本号的符号同义词。

trans-unit.source: This enum represent standard key bindings. They can be used to assign platform dependent keyboard shortcuts to a QAction.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举代表标准键绑定。它们可用于将依赖于平台的键盘快捷键分配给QAction。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents a control element. A control element is a part of a widget that performs some action or displays information to the user.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举代表一个控制元素。控制元素是widget的一部分,它可以执行一些操作或向用户显示信息。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents a sub-area of a widget. Style implementations use these areas to draw the different parts of a widget.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举代表一个小组件的子区域。样式实现使用这些区域来绘制小组件的不同部分。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the QCborValue type. It is returned by the type() function.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示QCborValue类型。它由type（）函数返回。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the acceleration mode of an acceleration sensor.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举表示加速度传感器的加速度模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the ambient light level.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示环境光照度。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the different ways a glyph can be rasterized in the function alphaMapForGlyph().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示在函数alphaMapForGlyph（）中栅格化字形的不同方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the options that can be set on a socket. If desired, they can be set after having received the connected() signal from the socket or after having received a new socket from a QTcpServer.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示可以在套接字上设置的选项。如果需要的话，它们可以在接收到后设置连接从插座或从已经接收一个新的套接字（）后信号QTcpServer既可。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the orientation of the device.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举表示设备的方向。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the state of a touch point at the time a QTouchEvent occurred.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示QTouchEvent发生时触摸点的状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the supported TouchWindow touch flags for RegisterTouchWindow().
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举表示RegisterTouchWindow()支持的TouchWindow触摸标志。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the supported WM_WINDOW_TYPE atoms.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举表示支持的WM_WINDOW_TYPE原子。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the type of device that generated a QPointerEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示生成QPointerEvent的设备的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the type of device that generated a QTouchEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示生成QTouchEvent的设备的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents what is interacting with the pointing device.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举表示的是与指向设备交互的东西。

trans-unit.source: This enum returns the gesture type.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举返回手势类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies a category of QML property.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了QML属性的类别。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies a component type.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了一个组件类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies a role of the data requested.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了请求数据的作用。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies a set of predefined presets for QGradient, based on the gradients from https://webgradients.com/.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举基于https://webgradients.com/中的渐变为QGradient指定了一组预定义的预设。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies a set of predefined presets for QGradient, based on the gradients from https://webgradients.com/.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举基于https://webgradients.com/中的渐变为QGradient指定了一组预定义的预设。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies a type of QML property.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了一个QML属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies different error cases
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了不同的错误情况

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies flags that can be used to affect various aspects of the section() function's behavior with respect to separators and empty fields.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定标志，这些标志可用于影响section（）函数相对于分隔符和空字段的行为的各个方面。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how QDomNode::save() determines what encoding to use when serializing.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定QDomNode :: save（）如何确定序列化时使用的编码。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how a state's child states are treated.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了如何处理一个状态的子状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how a state's child states are treated:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了如何处理一个状态的子状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how a text displaying widget reacts to user input.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了文本显示部件对用户输入的反应。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how camera view center is translated
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定了摄像机视图中心的转换方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how completions are provided to the user.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了如何向用户提供完备性。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how gradient coordinates map to the paint device on which the gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了如何将梯度坐标映射到使用梯度的绘图设备上。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how matching a file to a MIME type is performed.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了文件与MIME类型的匹配方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the split() function should behave with respect to empty strings.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定split（）函数应如何处理空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the setFont() function should behave with respect to unset font properties.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定setFont（）函数相对于未设置的字体属性的行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the items in the model are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了模型中项目的排序方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the layout handles its child widgets regarding their visibility.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定布局如何处理其子部件的可见性。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the size hint of the QAbstractScrollArea should adjust when the size of the viewport changes.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定当视口大小更改时，QAbstractScrollArea的大小提示应如何调整。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the size hint of the QComboBox should adjust when new content is added or content changes.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定添加新内容或更改内容时QComboBox的大小提示应如何调整。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the size hint of the QComboBox should adjust when new content is added or content changes.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定添加新内容或更改内容时QComboBox的大小提示应如何调整。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the split() functions should behave with respect to empty strings.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了split()函数对空字符串的处理方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how to align text in fields when the field is wider than the text that occupies it.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了当字段的宽度大于占用字段的文本时,如何对齐字段中的文本。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how to resize the view.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定如何调整视图的大小。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies string information that an accessible object returns.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了可访问对象返回的字符串信息。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the behavior of QWidget::activateWindow() and QWindow::requestActivate().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定QWidget :: activateWindow（）和QWindow :: requestActivate（）的行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the behavior of a modal panel. A modal panel is one that blocks input to other panels. Note that items that are children of a modal panel are not blocked.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定模态面板的行为。模态面板是一个能阻止输入到其他面板的面板。注意,模态面板的子项目不会被阻止。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the behavior of a modal window. A modal window is one that blocks input to other windows. Note that windows that are children of a modal window are not blocked.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了模态窗口的行为。模态窗口是指能阻止输入到其他窗口的窗口。请注意,模态窗口的子窗口不会被阻止。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the behavior of the QPixmap::createMaskFromColor() and QImage::createMaskFromColor() functions.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定QPixmap :: createMaskFromColor（）和QImage :: createMaskFromColor（）函数的行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the buttons in a wizard.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了向导中的按钮。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the content type to be shared.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定要共享的内容类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了坐标系。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the dictionary type of a word.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了一个词的字典类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different behaviours of readElementText().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定readElementText（）的不同行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different looks supported by QWizard.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定QWizard支持的不同外观。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different policies that can be used to control how the group performs exclusive checking on checkable actions.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了不同的策略,这些策略可以用来控制组如何对可检查动作执行独占检查。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different policies that can be used to control the way in which the form's fields grow.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了不同的策略,可以用来控制表格字段的生长方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different policies that can be used to control the way in which the form's rows wrap.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了不同的策略,这些策略可以用来控制表格行的缠绕方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different types of servers that can be started with startServer.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定可以使用startServer启动的服务器的不同类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different types of widgets in terms of layout interaction:
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了不同类型的小组件的布局交互。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the input mode for the input method.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了输入法的输入模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the kind of transition. By default, the type is an external transition.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了过渡的类型。默认情况下,该类型是外部过渡。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the order of which results from the map or filter function are passed to the reduce function.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了map或filter函数的结果传递给reduce函数的顺序。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the physical position of the camera on the system hardware.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定了摄像机在系统硬件上的物理位置。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the pixmaps that can be associated with a page.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了可以与页面关联的像素图。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the rendering backend for the surface.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了曲面的渲染后台。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the restore policy type. The restore policy takes effect when the machine enters a state which sets one or more properties. If the restore policy is set to QState.RestoreProperties, the state machine will save the original value of the property before the new value is set.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定还原策略类型。当计算机进入设置一个或多个属性的状态时，还原策略将生效。如果还原策略设置为QState .RestoreProperties，则状态机将在设置新值之前保存该属性的原始值。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the restore policy type. The restore policy takes effect when the machine enters a state which sets one or more properties. If the restore policy is set to RestoreProperties, the state machine will save the original value of the property before the new value is set.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定了还原策略类型。当机器进入一个设置一个或多个属性的状态时,还原策略就会生效。如果还原策略被设置为RestoreProperties,状态机将在设置新的值之前保存属性的原始值。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the rules for word reselection.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举规定了单词重选的规则。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the share error type.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了共享错误类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the text case for the input method.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了输入法的文本大小写。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the type of QOpenGLShader that is being created.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定要创建的QOpenGLShader的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the type of history that a QHistoryState records.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定QHistoryState记录的历史记录的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the type of history that a HistoryState records.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定HistoryState记录的历史记录的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the type of selection list.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定选择列表的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the type of token the reader just read.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了阅读器刚刚读取的令牌类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the types of widgets (or other layout items) that may appear in a row.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了一行中可能出现的小部件(或其他布局项)的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies various flags that can be set to affect the output of integers, floats, and doubles.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定可以设置为影响整数， float 和 double 的输出的各种标志。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies various options that affect the look and feel of a color dialog.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了影响颜色对话框外观和感觉的各种选项。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies various options that affect the look and feel of a font dialog.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了影响字体对话框外观和感觉的各种选项。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies various options that affect the look and feel of a wizard.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了影响向导外观和感觉的各种选项。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies various options that affect the look and feel of an input dialog.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了影响输入对话框的外观和感觉的各种选项。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies what shape a QRubberBand should have. This is a drawing hint that is passed down to the style system, and can be interpreted by each QStyle.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定QRubberBand应该具有的形状。这是一个传递给样式系统的绘图提示，每个QStyle都可以解释该提示。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies what should be done when a factory function in QDomDocument is called with invalid data.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定在使用无效数据调用QDomDocument中的工厂函数时应执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies what the QComboBox should do when a new string is entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定当用户输入新字符串时QComboBox应该做什么。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies what the QComboBox should do when a new string is entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定当用户输入新字符串时QComboBox应该做什么。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies where the ellipsis should appear when displaying texts that don't fit:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了在显示不合适的文本时,省略号应该出现在哪里。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies where the tick marks are to be drawn relative to the slider's groove and the handle the user moves.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了相对于滑块槽和用户移动手柄的刻度线的绘制位置。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies whether settings are user-specific or shared by all users of the same system.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了设置是用户专用还是同一系统的所有用户共享。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies which comparison mode is used when sampling this texture.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了在对这个纹理进行取样时使用的比较模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies which comparison operator is used when texture comparison is enabled on this texture.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了当该纹理上的纹理比较被启用时,使用的比较运算符。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies which component of a depth/stencil texture is accessed when the texture is sampled.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了当纹理被采样时,深度/钢笔纹理的哪个组件被访问。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies which notations to use for expressing float and double as strings.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定用于将 float 和 double 表示为字符串的表示法。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies why the focus changed. It will be passed through QWidget::setFocus and can be retrieved in the QFocusEvent sent to the widget upon focus change.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了焦点更改的原因。它将通过QWidget :: setFocus传递，并且可以在焦点更改时在发送到小部件的QFocusEvent中进行检索。

trans-unit.source: This enum tells the function advancesForGlyphIndexes() how to calculate the advances.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举告诉函数advancesForGlyphIndexes（）如何计算预付款。

trans-unit.source: This enum the different performance hints that can be set on the QStaticText. These hints can be used to indicate that the QStaticText should use additional caches, if possible, to improve performance at the expense of memory. In particular, setting the performance hint AggressiveCaching on the QStaticText will improve performance when using the OpenGL graphics system or when drawing to a QOpenGLWidget.
trans-unit.target: 这枚举了可以在QStaticText上设置的不同性能提示。这些提示可用于指示QStaticText如果可能的话，应使用附加的缓存来提高性能，但以牺牲内存为代价。特别是，在使用OpenGL图形系统或绘制到QOpenGLWidget时，在QStaticText上设置性能提示AggressiveCaching 将提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This enum type (not to be confused with Orientation) is used to specify each page's orientation.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型（不要与 Orientation 混淆）用于指定每个页面的方向。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines accessible event types.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型定义了可访问的事件类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines bit flags that can be combined to indicate the relationship between two accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型定义了可以组合的位标志,以表示两个可访问对象之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines errors that can occur in the state machine at run time. When the state machine encounters an unrecoverable error at run time, it will set the error code returned by error(), the error message returned by errorString(), and enter an error state based on the context of the error.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型定义在运行时状态机中可能发生的错误。当状态机在运行时遇到不可恢复的错误时，它将设置错误（）返回的错误代码，错误字符串（）返回的错误消息，并根据错误的上下文进入错误状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines special values for defaultPort.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型为defaultPort定义特殊值。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the Unicode decomposition attributes. See the Unicode Standard for a description of the values.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型定义Unicode分解属性。有关值的说明，请参见Unicode标准。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the Unicode decomposition attributes. See the Unicode Standard for a description of the values.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型定义Unicode分解属性。有关值的说明，请参见Unicode标准。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the Unicode direction attributes. See the Unicode Standard for a description of the values.

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the Unicode direction attributes. See the Unicode Standard for a description of the values.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型定义Unicode方向属性。有关值的说明，请参见Unicode标准。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the Unicode joining type attributes. See the Unicode Standard for a description of the values.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型定义Unicode连接类型属性。有关值的说明，请参见Unicode标准。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the Unicode joining type attributes. See the Unicode Standard for a description of the values.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型定义Unicode连接类型属性。有关值的说明，请参见Unicode标准。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the Unicode script property values.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型定义了Unicode脚本属性值。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the brush styles supported by Qt, i.e. the fill pattern of shapes drawn using QPainter.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型定义Qt支持的画笔样式，即使用QPainter绘制的形状的填充图案。

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the circumstances under which this application wants to be restarted by the session manager. The current values are:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型定义了这个应用程序在什么情况下会被会话管理器重新启动。目前的值是:

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the page orientation

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the pen cap styles supported by Qt, i.e. the line end caps that can be drawn using QPainter.

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines the pen join styles supported by Qt, i.e. which joins between two connected lines can be drawn using QPainter.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型定义Qt支持的笔连接样式，即可以使用QPainter绘制两条连接线之间的连接。
